posts.post_content:
5 stamps: Doyle, Rowan, Paskert, McConnell, and Doolan.  All are either pop 1 or 0 in the SGC registry. None of these have been graded by PSA.  They range from fair to near mint condition.  

Email or PM if interested.

[URL="http://www.flickr.com/photos/calvindog/6419626529/"][IMG]http://farm7.staticflickr.com/6052/6419626529_6b37181989_o.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
